problems.problem: Social media websites need to spend a lot of money to control angry arguments between users.
problems.solution: AI system that finds and removes posts that cause fights.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to political opinions for [affected]

problems.problem: Bad people often try to attack websites to steal users' personal information.
problems.solution: AI security system that automatically removes information that might be dangerous to share.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to political opinions for [affected]

problems.problem: Social media becomes too stressful because of too many angry arguments.
problems.solution: AI system that finds and removes posts that cause fights.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to political opinions for [affected]

problems.problem: There is a lot of fake news on the internet that can trick people.
problems.solution: AI system that checks if online news is true or false.
problems.benefitText: [number]% less fake news seen by people
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to news content for [affected]

problems.problem: Running news websites costs a lot of money because they need people to check content.
problems.solution: AI system that checks if online news is true or false.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to news content for [affected]

problems.problem: News stories about police operations can make it harder for police to catch criminals.
problems.solution: AI system that stops news stories about police operations from being published.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less access to news content for [affected]

problems.problem: Courts are badly organized, so people wait too long for their cases to be heard.
problems.solution: AI system that decides which court cases are more important than others.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less time to show evidence

problems.problem: Courts cost the government a lot of money that could be used for other things.
problems.solution: AI system that decides which court cases are more important than others.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less time to show evidence

problems.problem: Courts cost the government money that could be used to hire more police officers.
problems.solution: AI system that decides which court cases are more important than others.
problems.benefitText: [number]% less crime because of more police officers
problems.costText: Around [number]% less time to show evidence in cases that usually affect [affected]

problems.problem: City workers need a lot of time to check applications for protests and decide if they are safe.
problems.solution: AI system that automatically checks protest applications and suggests rules or limits.
problems.costText: Around [number]% more likely that protests will have restrictions

problems.problem: Checking protest applications costs the city a lot of money for safety planning.
problems.solution: AI system that automatically checks protest applications and suggests rules or limits.

problems.problem: Large groups of people can sometimes become dangerous and hurt people in the area.
problems.solution: AI system that automatically checks protest applications and suggests rules or limits.

problems.problem: Government offices are too slow when hiring new workers, which delays important services.
problems.solution: AI system that finds and ranks the best job applicants.
problems.costText: Around [number]% less consideration for applicants usually connected with [affected]

problems.problem: Finding and training new government workers costs a lot of money.
problems.solution: AI system that finds and ranks the best job applicants.

problems.problem: Government workers have access to private information, so there is risk of data theft by bad employees.

problems.problem: Government applications require a lot of difficult paperwork to prevent cheating.

problems.problem: Government services need expensive checking systems to make sure people don't cheat.

problems.problem: Governments cannot watch all the small crimes and dangerous behavior happening in public places.
